content:
Image datasets

These image files are from Sayood's book. They are 8 bits per pixel grey level images stored in raster scan order. The complete image collection can be downloaded as a zip archive.
Image Size Description
sena.img 256 × 256 Boy
sinan.img 256 × 256 Girl
elif.img 256 × 256 Girl
earth.img 256 × 256 Earth
omaha.img 256 × 256 aerial view of a portion of Omaha, Nebraska
sensin.img 256 × 256 Two boys
bookshelf1.img 256 × 256 bookshelf
bookshelf2.img 256 × 256 closer view of a bookshelf
Last modified: Dec 19, 2000
